subject: Attention: Robert
body:
[Who will investigate the U.S. Supreme Court? Unclear. - Minnesota Reformer]
SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES.
1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW Washington DC 20500. USA.
From: John Glover Roberts Jr, 205 440 1352
Chief Justice of The Supreme Court of The United States
Attention: Robert

 Thank you for your response and God bless you, for not take much your time the delivery agent conformed your address and they shall proceed to your doorstep as soon as you comply with the required charged fees now, they needed US$75.00 only for the approval order certificate (RAOC) with the Provision of Affidavit of Claim Certificate.

 Finally, you are advised now to buy a steam wallet card of $75 dollars or Razor Gold Gift card today and send it immediately once you receive this message so that within 5 working hours your package or consignment box or ATM CARD will get to your destination with your giving information. So I'm waiting to hear from you with the fee for us to proceed the delivery of your package peacefully.

You can send  the fees to our secretary bitcoin wallet below:
1McnaqCh2dFvMBQU6LUZ1HX29yYojosLL9

Thanks and God bless.
Best Regards,
Yours Truly In Service,
Hon. Mr.John Glover Roberts Jr
E-mail: supremecourt.gov.us@outlook.com.

[Meet the Supreme Court Justices | State of Illinois Office of the Courts]

subject: Re: Attention: Robert
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I have a few questions regarding the information you shared.

1. Could you please provide more details about the delivery agent and what they will be delivering to my doorstep?
2. What is the purpose of the approval order RAOC and the Provision of Affidavit of Claim?
3. Can you explain why I need to buy a steam wallet card or Razor Gold Gift card? How will these cards be used in relation to the delivery?

I appreciate your time and assistance in clarifying these points. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Attention: Robert
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I appreciate the information you shared about the Supreme Court of the United States.

I have a few questions regarding the delivery process. Could you please provide more details about the delivery agent and how they confirmed my address? Also, what are the required charged fees for? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Additionally, could you explain why I need to buy a steam wallet card or Razor Gold Gift card? How does that relate to the delivery of my package or box or ATM CARD?

Thank you for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert
